description:
Cascadia is the addictive bubble cascading strategy game with 500 levels so you'll never be bored! 

You get a certain number of clicks per level - click on a bubble, once it turns red it explodes hitting the neighbouring bubbles. Explode the bubbles in the right order to cause a cascade that wipes them all out before moving onto the next level.

After a bit of practice you'll learn the strategy for determining the best bubbles to click to get a win. 

This game is highly addictive - be warned!
